select_file_to_edit: Select a File to start editing.
i18n_open_folder_to_edit: Open a folder to start editing <1><0></0> Open</1>
file_already_exists_cannot_crate: Cannot create the File because already exists.
default_crate_key_lore_0: &fA key that can be used to
enter_file_name_of_crate: Type the file name of the new Crate.
listing_files_error: Cannot list files due an error...
no_compatible_files_to_list: There is not compatible files with the editor in this folder. Change the Editor settings to view all files.
file_is_not_a_cc_file: This is not a Crazy Crates file.
file_parse_error: Problem found while parsing YAML file, verify that the YAML syntax is correct.
save_file_error: Cannot save file due an internal error.
delete_all_rewards_modal_title: All Content of this Crate will be deleted!
delete_reward_cannot_be_undone: The Reward(s) will be deleted and cannot be undone, except if you have a Backup of this Crate.
are_sure_to_remove_reward: Are you sure to remove this Reward?
content_edited_manual: You have edited this file manually.
edit_prize_name_to_display_description: Enter the name that will be displayed in the tooltip message inside the in-game GUI.
edit_prize_material_to_display_descripti: Select the material that will be displayed as icon of this prize inside the in-game GUI.
edit_prize_amount_to_display_description: Enter the amount that will be displayed in the item stack of this prize inside the in-game GUI.
edit_prize_lore_description: This lore will be displayed in the tooltip message inside the in-game GUI. Each line represents a line in the tooltip message.
edit_prize_range_description: The range that will be used to calculate the chance of this prize to be selected in the rewards. You should keep this in 100.
edit_prize_chance_description: Set the chance of this prize to be selected when a Player uses this Crate. Take in consideration that the Chance are related to the Range defined above.
edit_prize_firework_description: If enabled, a firework effect will be spawned at crate location when a Player wons this prize.
edit_prize_glow_effect_description: If enabled, the item displayed for this prize inside the in-game GUI will have a glowing effect (the same glowing effect when you enchant an item).
edit_prize_no_enchantments_configured: No enchantments configured yet, try to add one enchantment first.
edit_prize_enchantments_description: All enchantments configured here will be displayed in the item displayed inside the in-game GUI, but will not be applied to the final item that the player will get.
edit_prize_no_commands_configured: No commands configured yet, try to add one command first.
edit_prize_commands_input_placeholder: Type the command to execute, without the /
edit_prize_messages_description: Each line break is a message that will be displayed at in-game chat when a player wons this prize.
edit_prize_messages_should_configure_a_m: You should configure a message to be previewed.
edit_prize_items_description: Each item configured here will be give to the player that wons this Prize. You can configure one or more Items, and you should use this configuration instead of giving items through commands like the /give command of Essentials, but, if you want, you can configure commands instead of using this feature provided by Crazy Crates.
edit_prize_no_items_configured: No items configured yet, try to add one item first.
itemflag_HIDE_DESTROYS: Hide what the ItemStack can break/destroy
itemflag_HIDE_DYE: Hide dyes from coloured leather armour
itemflag_HIDE_PLACED_ON: Hide where this ItemStack can be build/placed on
modal_extradata_warning_1: Enabling this feature will add extra data to the structure of the YAML file of this Crate that are not present in the original Crazy Crates file.
modal_extradata_warning_2: This have no impact on performance or an effect at server side, so do not worry, this is only a message to notify that the file will have extra data that only this editor can recognize.
crate_editor_special_global_lore_title: Use a global lore for all prizes.
crate_editor_special_global_lore_descrip: Global lore will be prepended to the specific lore of a Prize, so you can use global lore to share same information across all prizes. Remember that you can use some placeholders such: {Chance} {DisplayName} {DisplayAmount} {CommandCount}, that will be replaced depending on the Prize.
crate_editor_special_global_lore_no_data: Type a description to preview it...
prize_item_editor_enchantments_descripti: Select an enchantment from the list and click on the 'Add' button to add the selected enchantment. Enchantments that you have already selected will not be shown on the list.
prize_item_editor_flags_description: Select a flag from the list and click on the 'Add' button to add the selected flag. Flags that you have already selected will not be shown on the list.
